title: Baked potato with tomatoes and ricotta
directions: Preheat oven to 392°F (200°C). Oil the potatoes with olive oil, put on a baking sheet and bake until
it is tender when piercing with a knife. It takes about an hour.
Take a sheet of foil and cover a pan, then lay out tomatoes. Sprinkle them with a tablespoon
of olive oil and a teaspoon of coarse salt and black pepper.
15 minutes until potatoes cooked, put a pan with tomatoes in an oven and leave it until they crack.
Make a couple of cuts on potatoes (lines or criss-cross). Put ricotta and roasted tomatoes on the
top. You can also sprinkle it with fresh chopped green.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon of 1 tablespoon of olive oil
1 glass of ricotta (or any other cream cheese)
